name: Warrior's Banner
description: A standard of crimson and gold, signifying its bearer as a celebrated warrior of the Coliseum.

name: Splintered Buckler
description: Legacy Gear

name: Circled of Perpetual Flame
description: Forged in the underworld, the flame contained by this circlet is a tribute to your raw power and aggression!

name: Stylish Top Hat
description: It's a classic yet stylish piece of headgear!

name: Arcanist's Axe
description: Imbued with arcane runes, this eternally sharpened axe whispers dark portents.

name: Ravager's Scimitar
description: The barbaric Ravagers of Ravenspire use these swords to inspire fear in their enemies

name: Doomshard Staff
description: The powerful but unstable doomshards in this staf give off a strange luminescent glow.

name: Executor's Shield
description: Imported from Stonehelm, this shield once belonged to the fearless Order of the Executor.

name: Dragonmaw Axe
description: This deadly axe is imbued with dragonstone, charging it with great power.

name: Ravenspire Sword
description: An immaculately-crafted blade used by the king's guard in the Eastern lands of Ravenspire.

name: Lunar Crescent
description: Crafted by the Order of Luna, this staff channels the power of the moon.

name: Carapace Shield
description: Made from the carapace of a deadly sea creature, this shield is charged with powerful ward.

name: Tragick's Despair
description: A coal-black ember of hatred to replace your hero's eyes with a dark void.

name: Tragick's Envy
description: An ember of jealousy to cast your hero's eyes in a twisted green light. - Legacy Gear

name: Tragick's Guilt
description: Purple eyes

name: Tragick's Love
description: An ember of companionship to cast your hero's eyes in a pink light. - Legacy Gear

name: Tragick's Loyalty
description: Blue eyes

name: Tragick's Rage
description: Red eyes

name: Tragick's Wisdom
description: An ember of pure knowledge to cast your hero's eyes in a white light. - Legacy Gear

name: Cursed Heart
description: A staff of Tragick's own design, its crystal heart is fashioned from purified, physical forms of malice and despair.

name: Truly Cursed Heart
description: The fully empowered staff of Tragick

name: Valentine's Golden Bracers
description: A more powerful version of Valentine's bracers, trimmed in gold.

name: Pendant of Despair
description: This pendant of hopelessness can be used to locate Despair among Glenfort's most powerful enemies. (Raid: Primal Mysteries)

name: Eternal Romance Talisman
description: A sign of true love and romance! (Limited Time!)

name: The Heart Stopper
description: Protect Glenfort's romantecs with this gleaming shield! (Limited Time!)

name: Grinning Skull Patch
description: An eye patch emblazoned with a skull pattern, meant to instill fear in all who meet your gaze.

name: Pirate Bandana
description: One o' me official crewman bandanas! (Limited Time!)

name: Pirate Hat
description: Yer own official captain's hat! The high seas are callin' ye! (Limited Time!)

name: Shark Leather Coat
description: An overcoat crafter from the hide of a great white shark. Worn by only the most fearsome of pirates.

name: Shark Leather Gloves
description: A pair of heavy gloves crafted from the hide of a great white shark. Impervious to shivered timbers.

name: Ring of Hornswoggle
description: Yo Ho Ho, wouldn't be a scurvy pirate if thar wasn't some type 'o cheatin'

name: Pimm the Pirate Monkey
description: Thanks to an ancient pirate curse, Pimm the Pirate Monkey will pipe into chat when ya least expect it! (Limited Time!)

name: Dread Cutlass
description: Despite its decorative appearence, this cutlass has seen its fair share of death and mayhem. (Limited Time!)

name: Mitre of Glenfort
description: The power of Glenfort's holiday spirit infuses this penultimate piece of holiday headwear.

name: Halo of the Heavens
description: You shile just a little bit brighter this holiday season! (Limited Time!)

name: Goblin's Bag of Goodies
description: The Holiday Goblin's magical bag of goodies will randomly sprout gifts of all shapes and sizes for fellow adventures! (Limited Time!)

name: Green Holiday Hat
description: Spread the holiday cheer! (Winter Holiday 2013/16)

name: Elfin' Longhelm
description: A ceremonial longhelm with a pair of pointy Elfin' ears. Embody the spirit of the holidays -- literally, because the elf's spirit is probably still trapped in that hat.

name: Red Holiday Hat
description: Spread the holiday cheer! (Limited Time!)

name: Holiday Cheer Helm
description: Forged at the top of the world, this ancient helmet is said to contain near-mythic levels of holiday cheer. (Winter Holiday 2014)

name: Yuletide's Frost
description: A staff fashioned from a single piece of enchanted ice, it reaches out with razor-sharp shards to engulf its foes in death's cold grip. Requires Level 35

name: Yuletide Battleaxe
description: Specially consructed by the Hoiday Goblin (of Doom) to spread holiday cheer, in addition to chaos and mass desctruction.

name: Sweater of Festivity
description: Nobody knows the origins of this unique garment, as it has been passed down and re-gifted for countless millennia. (Limited Time!) Requires Level 30

name: Red Holiday Coat
description: Your belly now shakes when you laugh, like a bowl full of jelly! (Limited Time!) Requires Level 30

name: Angletic Wings
description: Bring peace to Glenfort's strife with the wings of an angel! (Limited Time!) Requires Level 30

name: Yuletide Greataxe
description: A massive greataxe imbued with powerful Elfin' cheers, Distilled from their very life essence by powerful Yuletide magic.

name: Huge Peppermint Stick
description: Justice just got a little bit sweeter! (Limited Time!)

name: Pointy Peppermint Stick
description: Exact sweet, sweet justice upon your foes! (Limited Time!)

name: Dracula's Mantle
description: This darkened coat envelopes you in darkness.

name: Dark Accursed Helm
description: A helmet of dark power, said to chanel the maddening pale essence of the moon itself (Limited Time!)

name: Old Frying Pan
description: Deal some wrought-iron justice with this powerful culinary artifact. (Limited Time!)

name: Werewere Necklace
description: This mishmash of cutlery and teeth contains powerful magic!

name: Lycanthrope Tail
description: A stylish tail of mysterious origin, inspired by the deadly werewolves of Glenfort. (Limited Time!)

name: Faerie Disguise
description: With this disguise you look like Lucky's significantly less evil twin! (Limited Time!)

name: Lucky's Shillelagh
description: The festive walking stick packs a wallop! (Limited Time!)

name: Raider's Kilt
description: A ceremonial kilt inlaid with an ancient symbol of power and prestige.

name: Leprechaun Boots
description: These hardy boots are sure to provide a little luck to any who wears them!

name: Wanderer's Kilt
description: A tartan kilt popular with the wandering warriors in the lands around Stonehelm.

name: Prestine Sword of the Vile
description: The empowered Sword of the Vile. Legacy Gear

name: Time Lost Sword
description: Despite the fact that this weapon seems a bit old fashioned, you cn see how it might have once beenthe weapon of a true champion!

name: Ancient Golden Emblazonment
description: In ages past, gladiators dared to enter the Coliseum without the burden of armor, proving their unmatched skill in one-on-one combat (Gold League, PVP, Season 1) - Legacy Gear

name: Ancient Platinum Emblazonment
description: (Platinum League, PVP, Season 1) - Legacy Gear

name: The Master's Emblazonment
description: (Masters League, PVP, Season 1) - Legacy Gear

name: Amulet of Creation
description: Long protected by the mysterious Keepers, this strange and terrible artifact whispers cryptic warnings of something long-forgotten beneath the surface of Glenfort.

name: Karnak's Ring
description: You now understand why Karnak sought to enter our world; the power of the Void, combined with Glenfort's finest gems, has resulted in an artifact with power almost unfathomable.

name: Ring of Eternity
description: The potent arcane energies that result form combining the power of the Void, Glenfort's vast resources, and the ancient knowledge of the Keepers are likely more than mere mortals were meant to wield.

name: Chef's Uniform
description: Legacy Gear

name: Glenfort Helmet
description: Legacy Gear
